author: derfreimann

changelog.release_notes: - added burning T-Rex (now there's 64 monsters in total)

- changed pictures fore Doc5 and Doc11.1
- added 3 monsters
- TARDIS, TIME LORD, DALEK now won't appear upon starting (because they're special 8])
- bugfix: 4th and 11th doctors' outfit didn't change at 16 and 23 o'clock (just in the mornings)

- 60 monsters in total
- 4th and 11th change their outfit now after half an hour
- watchface will now ALWAYS start with a monster (and all monsters can be manually triggered at start)
- added 19 monsters (=> 43 in total) - bugfix: some monsters were cut on the right side

- bugfixes (no crashes anymore... nowhere!)
- random enemies
- animated regeneration
- reduced size from 72 to 64kB (~11%) by reduzing size of battery images and removing an old unused font resource

description:
Features cute, miniature versions of your favorite Doctor Who timelord!

✿ Update v2.3 [Sep.22]
- added 1 monster, the burning T-Rex from Ep01S08 (=64 monsters in total)

please visit WEBSITE for full details on the Watchface and the used Dr. Who aliens!

also:
- animation
- battery status
- AM/PM indicator
- monsters
 
Very special thanks to artist and initiator Jonathan Abucejo!

Check out github (source link) to see the code and contribute if you like :D

latest_release.release_notes: - added burning T-Rex (now there's 64 monsters in total)

title: tiny doctors
